catalyst: The catalysts used in the experiment are Pt(in)ATiO2 and Pt(on)ATiO2, where Pt is incorporated into the TiO2 films either by adding the precursor salt in the sol (Pt(in)) or by wet impregnation of calcined film with an aqueous solution of the precursor salt (Pt(on)).
lamp: The lamp used in the experiment for UV tests was a 150 W UVA lamp, and for visible light tests, a 75 W daylight lamp was used.
